# sage-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                  | Type     | Default   |
| --------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | --------- |
| `inputId` | `input-id` | A unique identifier for the input field                                                                      | `string` | `''`      |
| `label`   | `label`    | Text to be displayed as the form label                                                                       | `string` | `'label'` |
| `type`    | `type`     | Determines the type of control that will be displayed `'email'`, `'number'`, `'password'`, `'tel'`, `'text'` | `string` | `'text'`  |
| `value`   | `value`    | The value of the input "text"                                                                                | `string` | `''`      |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                        |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------------- |
|      | Content is placed between the opening closing tags |
